channel.title: Saradomin ~ Join the Best & Forget the Rest!
channel.description:
[color=orange][center][img]http://www.saradomin.com/community/public/style_images/5_Untitled.png[/img][color=#be9116] | [url=http://saradomin.com/?ref=runeserver]Home[/url] | [url=http://saradomin.com/community]Join the community Forums[/url] | [url=http://saradomin.com/SaraLauncher.jar]Download our Launcher[/url] | [url=http://saradomin.com/highscores]HighScores[/url] | [url=http://saradomin.com/vote]Vote[/url] | [url=http://www.saradomin.com/community/index.php?/store/]Store[/url] [url=http://|ts3server:/sj01.gameservers.com/?port=9293&nickname=ForumGuest&password=]Join our Teamspeak[/url] | [size=14pt] Make sure to check out our newly updated media! - 12/18/15
[URL=http://"http://saradomin.com/SaraLauncher.jar"]Play Now![/URL] [URL=http://"https://join.skype.com/s5v6G5Yl61ef"]Join Community Skype chat![/url][/size]
Unique content including our Void Knight Overlord! He will be dropping all rare items from claws, to torva, to parthats. All drop rates will be extremely low. He has 7 attacks that he will perform one of which every 10 seconds. - Drops his targets prayer by 15 points. - Increases his defense by 15% (10 seconds) - Burn his target for 15 points damage every 5 seconds (10 seconds) - Freeze his target and inflict 5 points of damage every 5 seconds (10 seconds) - Lower his targets defence, attack and strength by 15 levels - He does double damage (10 seconds) - He becomes immune to damage, and inflicts all targets around him for 25 damage (5 seconds immunity, then 15 seconds of nothing)
[IMG]http://saradomin.com/advertise/new/8.png[/img]
Also, look forward to the coming of the Saradomin Official Radio! [spoiler=Media] [IMG]http://saradomin.com/advertise/new/1.png[/img] [IMG]http://saradomin.com/advertise/new/2.png[/img] [IMG]http://saradomin.com/advertise/new/11.png[/img] [IMG]http://saradomin.com/advertise/new/12.png[/img] [IMG]http://saradomin.com/advertise/new/3.png[/img] [IMG]http://saradomin.com/advertise/new/4.png[/img] [IMG]http://saradomin.com/advertise/new/5.png[/img] [IMG]http://saradomin.com/advertise/new/6.png[/img] [IMG]http://saradomin.com/advertise/new/7.png[/img] [IMG]http://saradomin.com/advertise/new/9.png[/img] [IMG]http://saradomin.com/advertise/new/10.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://saradomin.com/advertise/new/10.png[/img] [IMG]http://saradomin.com/advertise/new/13.png[/img] [IMG]http://saradomin.com/advertise/new/14.png[/img] [IMG]http://saradomin.com/advertise/new/15.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://saradomin.com/advertise/new/16.png[/img] [IMG]http://saradomin.com/advertise/new/17.png[/img] [IMG]http://saradomin.com/advertise/new/18.png[/img] [IMG]http://saradomin.com/advertise/new/19.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://saradomin.com/advertise/new/20.png[/img]
[SIZE=5][COLOR="#FF0000"]OLD MEDIA - TO BE TAKEN LIGHTLY[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eoGbDlA.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NvLNbTG.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qQRizJE.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3mN9xO6.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KwB1Ol1.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9osX4rz.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TN3WSaZ.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dTzUivQ.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/f1Kcwkd.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RV0aYxz.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MaYr7Qo.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZiZXH9e.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/juEiyQt.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RkWpHyg.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Y5ncLK3.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rkV1E4n.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/u6p3tcw.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/InoUNdz.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/iJmzFuc.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TAFyWY4.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sXoUYh3.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AJk9jF2.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/F8kufxY.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MmkP3JC.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tn11gdC.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7HdSzn9.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/97pBryk.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/T4tiHIY.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/S6rm6Bjb.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HRJnzDo.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/scVxBnl.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2HHWjYV.png?1[/img] And much much much more! [/spoiler] [spoiler=Latest Updates] I have added new media to the thread!
Also: Here is our newest updates:
12/28/15 Hello Saradomians! Big update for you all today! -New Launcher Released -New Client Released -New Fog System -New Fog Regions -HD Ground Textures -Added Edgeville to City Teleport -Added ::bugs to help encourage the proper reporting of bugs -Fixed bugs making constants not updating on restart -Added Multi Line Chat -Fixed Resizeable/Fullscreen unable to click after changing bug -Added Super Poison for Primal Spear (p++) -Added Super Poison for Primal Dagger (p++) -Added Primal Longsword, Primal Rapier, Primal 2h Sword, Primal Maul, Primal Spear (p++) and Primal Dagger (p++) to Mystery Box at a lower chance then Spirit Shield Sigils -Added One of Each Partyhat color to Mysterybox at a very very very rare chance. -Added Santa Hat at rate slightly higher then Partyhat -Added One of Each Halloween Mask at a rate slightly higher then Santa hat -Added Bunny Ears at rate slightly higher then Halloween Masks -Removed Normal Bones from Mystery Box -Added Frost Dragon Bones to Mystery Box at a slightly lower chance then Dragon Bones -Added Dragon Fire Shield to Mystery Box -Added Dragon Platebody, Dragon Platelegs, Dragon Full Helm, Dragon Gauntlets and Dragon SQ Shield to Mystery box in replacement of rune. -Removed Runes from Mystery Box -Removed Skilling Resources from Mystery Box (Excluding Raw Food) -Made Mystery Box Consistent -Removed Warnings and Errors -Changed login Messages and Constants. -Made coupon code proper again -Changed site wide download links to SaraLauncher.jar rather then Saradomin.jar -Added Downloads category, with Cache, Launcher and Standalone Client links.
AND MORE! Download the launcher now! [url=http://saradomin.com/SaraLauncher.jar]http://saradomin.com/SaraLauncher.jar[/url]
New website released New vote site released (Will release claim on friday) New store held website sided rather then shop ingame completed. New forums theme completed. New client Login screen and registration completed (Release friday) Saradomin Launcher completed, (Release tomorrow or friday)
(#125) Fixed cooking while banking. Cooking stops when you move now (#123) Fixed talon beast interaction freezing/crashing client (#113) Added command ::toggle to turn off game messages (Only as example how to do it, add exceptions etc, method in player class, toggleMessages) (#95) Fixed boaters going weapon slot (#83) Gave balmung same animations and speed as dharoks axe (#80) Fixed dagon hai models (#76) Gave original rs bonuses to monk robes, rest seems fixed (#72) Fixed combat bracelets turning into vials and potions not emptying (#67) Changed exit teleport to falador instead Edgeville, rest seems to be fixed (#54) Fixed Compost & super compost dupe on farming patch (#53) Fixed Thorn snail and Spirit spider pouch crafting (lvl 4 & 10) (#52) Fixed invisible monsters and invisible skeletons slayer task (#45) Fixed throwing knives smithed 1 knife instead 5 (#40) Added extra menu to runecraft teleports with 2 new altar locations (#39) Custom masp issue. Add new altar to cosmic rift. (#31) Added Default common and rare drops to cave crawlers (#29) Fixed barmarian net messing you up (#27) Fixed obsticles teleporting random places (#26) Added player forced walk for door in Varrock sewers for further access (needs edit) (#24) Added timer to avoid spamclicks between making crafting items (#23) Glassblow and leather interface shows now only if used correct tools (#11) Fixed female pickpocketing in falador park (#14) Cleared ::commands from non existing commands and doubles (#18) Added freeze after you get stunned by pickpocket mobs (Untested) (#19) Added timer for thieving to stop pickpocket spam (2600 ms) (#2) Fixed Dragon battleaxe attack styles at switching (Now goes stre when switching) (#86) Prayer drain seems to be working like it supposed to (#75) Fixed prayer bonuses not working as intended (#64) Fixed taking control on front end speakers (#51) Make fires in bank
Invisible cursor Fixed. Proper Double XP Rewrite of how Double xp is handled SQLite fix and some minor changes. Auctions system disabled ingame until finished. Added rights for live testing Allowed Spaces in username Made the LIVE_MODE be the determining factor for initializing the database Wizard Robe Fix Join Zombie Minigame disabled until finish Fix for eye of newts Starter Rewrite Fixed starter reset on second login FunPK with PVP drops Coupon Code Additions Fixed soulsplit projectile delay Multiple stability fixes Half way through rewrite of player saving and loading
- Special Attacks being infinate - Fixed by Arham - Vote points saving & loading - Fixed by Arham - Clan Chat shows double text and your name twice on first login - Fixed by Arham - PVP Points now granted for each kill
-Rune Warhammer added to Melee Weapons Store -Dicebag added to voteshop -Dicebag added to donatorshop -Removed Prayer Potions from General Shop to increase the profit in Herblore -Replace Super Strength Potion with Strength Potion in General Shop to increase the profit in Herblore -Replace Super Attack Potion with Attack Potion in General Shop to increase the profit in Herblore -Replace Super Defence Potion with Defence Potion in General Shop to increase the profit in Herblore -Removed Manta Rays from the General Shop to increase the profit in Fishing/Cooking -Removed Sharks from the General Shop to increase the profit in Fishing/Cooking
- Slayer XP Raised - Melee, Magic, Range XP Rates slightly Lowered - Changed overall xp bonus from 3 > 2 - A start on the war system and slavery system - Arham - A Start on force walking - Arham - Mystery Boxes being more consistant - Arham
Account backup system setup Saves account backup every hour, saving only the last 5. Proper sanctions via Admin Panel Rewrite on automatic save, pull, restart with ant Ironman started.
Miscellaneous other fixes, enhancements or backend changes.
Look forward to these future updates, coming next! - Combat Rewrite - Godwars Rewrite - Multi Revision and Data - More bug and stability fixes and improvements - Nex - Get Paid2Play systems - Multiple unique content updates by Arham [/spoiler][color=orange] Journey to the world of Saradomin, a 317 RSPS that's packed with high quality content, focused around the rise of Saradomin. Our server combines the excitement of intense PVP combat, with flawless skilling and PvE that helps foster our player-driven economy.
At Saradomin, we strive to deliver unique, distinct, & diverse content that's exclusive to our server. We're constantly trying to improve and expand, and will never stop working to provide our members with content of the highest quality.
If you have been looking for these things, you've found the tip of the spear in RSPS excellence!
We offer competitive xp rates, daily bug fixes, weekly content updates, weekend events and more!
We are building our lore, quests and cutscenes as we speak getting ready for the first quest of a 40 quest storyline! - All prewritten by our wonderful lore writer!
We are not a pay to win server, in fact, there is nothing you can buy that will directly give you an immediate edge over any other player! Keeping the game as fun and competitive as it should be! [/center]

item.title: Saradomin ~ Join the Best & Forget the Rest!
item.dc:creator: @ruzylo Ruzylo
item.description:
@ruzylo wrote:

Soulcist:

Much of it was quite interesting and had a pretty good time on the server, got me a little back interested in RSPS. It does deserve the recognition and so forth. The website and forum were both matching (which is hard to find in some communities, and it bothers me) and both were nice. Good luck!

Very happy to hear the positive feedback! Thank you!

[quote=“nolan2131, post:2, topic:554237”]Good luck, Chris <3[/quote]Thank you Nolan! <3

Read full topic
item.source: Saradomin ~ Join the Best & Forget the Rest!

item.title: Saradomin ~ Join the Best & Forget the Rest!
item.dc:creator: @ruzylo Ruzylo
item.description:
@ruzylo wrote:

[color=orange][center][color=#be9116]
| Home | Join the community Forums | Download our Launcher | HighScores | Vote | Store Join our Teamspeak |
[size=14pt]
Make sure to check out our newly updated media! - 12/18/15

[URL=http://“http://saradomin.com/SaraLauncher.jar”]Play Now![/URL]
Join Community Skype chat![/size]

Unique content including our Void Knight Overlord! He will be dropping all rare items from claws, to torva, to parthats. All drop rates will be extremely low.
He has 7 attacks that he will perform one of which every 10 seconds.

  • Drops his targets prayer by 15 points.
  • Increases his defense by 15% (10 seconds)
  • Burn his target for 15 points damage every 5 seconds (10 seconds)
  • Freeze his target and inflict 5 points of damage every 5 seconds (10 seconds)
  • Lower his targets defence, attack and strength by 15 levels
  • He does double damage (10 seconds)
  • He becomes immune to damage, and inflicts all targets around him for 25 damage (5 seconds immunity, then 15 seconds of nothing)

Also, look forward to the coming of the Saradomin Official Radio!
[spoiler=Media]



















[SIZE=5][COLOR="#FF0000"]OLD MEDIA - TO BE TAKEN LIGHTLY[/COLOR][/SIZE]

































And much much much more!
[/spoiler]
[spoiler=Latest Updates]
I have added new media to the thread!

Also: Here is our newest updates:

12/28/15
Hello Saradomians!
Big update for you all today!
-New Launcher Released
-New Client Released
-New Fog System
-New Fog Regions
-HD Ground Textures
-Added Edgeville to City Teleport
-Added ::bugs to help encourage the proper reporting of bugs
-Fixed bugs making constants not updating on restart
-Added Multi Line Chat
-Fixed Resizeable/Fullscreen unable to click after changing bug
-Added Super Poison for Primal Spear (p++)
-Added Super Poison for Primal Dagger (p++)
-Added Primal Longsword, Primal Rapier, Primal 2h Sword, Primal Maul, Primal Spear (p++) and Primal Dagger (p++) to Mystery Box at a lower chance then Spirit Shield Sigils
-Added One of Each Partyhat color to Mysterybox at a very very very rare chance.
-Added Santa Hat at rate slightly higher then Partyhat
-Added One of Each Halloween Mask at a rate slightly higher then Santa hat
-Added Bunny Ears at rate slightly higher then Halloween Masks
-Removed Normal Bones from Mystery Box
-Added Frost Dragon Bones to Mystery Box at a slightly lower chance then Dragon Bones
-Added Dragon Fire Shield to Mystery Box
-Added Dragon Platebody, Dragon Platelegs, Dragon Full Helm, Dragon Gauntlets and Dragon SQ Shield to Mystery box in replacement of rune.
-Removed Runes from Mystery Box
-Removed Skilling Resources from Mystery Box (Excluding Raw Food)
-Made Mystery Box Consistent
-Removed Warnings and Errors
-Changed login Messages and Constants.
-Made coupon code proper again
-Changed site wide download links to SaraLauncher.jar rather then Saradomin.jar
-Added Downloads category, with Cache, Launcher and Standalone Client links.

AND MORE!
Download the launcher now!
http://saradomin.com/SaraLauncher.jar

New website released
New vote site released (Will release claim on friday)
New store held website sided rather then shop ingame completed.
New forums theme completed.
New client Login screen and registration completed (Release friday)
Saradomin Launcher completed, (Release tomorrow or friday)

(#125) Fixed cooking while banking. Cooking stops when you move now
(#123) Fixed talon beast interaction freezing/crashing client
(#113) Added command ::toggle to turn off game messages (Only as example how to do it, add exceptions etc, method in player class, toggleMessages)
(#95) Fixed boaters going weapon slot
(#83) Gave balmung same animations and speed as dharoks axe
(#80) Fixed dagon hai models
(#76) Gave original rs bonuses to monk robes, rest seems fixed
(#72) Fixed combat bracelets turning into vials and potions not emptying
(#67) Changed exit teleport to falador instead Edgeville, rest seems to be fixed
(#54) Fixed Compost & super compost dupe on farming patch
(#53) Fixed Thorn snail and Spirit spider pouch crafting (lvl 4 & 10)
(#52) Fixed invisible monsters and invisible skeletons slayer task
(#45) Fixed throwing knives smithed 1 knife instead 5
(#40) Added extra menu to runecraft teleports with 2 new altar locations
(#39) Custom masp issue. Add new altar to cosmic rift.
(#31) Added Default common and rare drops to cave crawlers
(#29) Fixed barmarian net messing you up
(#27) Fixed obsticles teleporting random places
(#26) Added player forced walk for door in Varrock sewers for further access (needs edit)
(#24) Added timer to avoid spamclicks between making crafting items
(#23) Glassblow and leather interface shows now only if used correct tools
(#11) Fixed female pickpocketing in falador park
(#14) Cleared ::commands from non existing commands and doubles
(#18) Added freeze after you get stunned by pickpocket mobs (Untested)
(#19) Added timer for thieving to stop pickpocket spam (2600 ms)
(#2) Fixed Dragon battleaxe attack styles at switching (Now goes stre when switching)
(#86) Prayer drain seems to be working like it supposed to
(#75) Fixed prayer bonuses not working as intended
(#64) Fixed taking control on front end speakers
(#51) Make fires in bank

Invisible cursor Fixed.
Proper Double XP
Rewrite of how Double xp is handled
SQLite fix and some minor changes.
Auctions system disabled ingame until finished.
Added rights for live testing
Allowed Spaces in username
Made the LIVE_MODE be the determining factor for initializing the database
Wizard Robe Fix
Join Zombie Minigame disabled until finish
Fix for eye of newts
Starter Rewrite
Fixed starter reset on second login
FunPK with PVP drops
Coupon Code Additions
Fixed soulsplit projectile delay
Multiple stability fixes
Half way through rewrite of player saving and loading

  • Special Attacks being infinate - Fixed by Arham
  • Vote points saving & loading - Fixed by Arham
  • Clan Chat shows double text and your name twice on first login - Fixed by Arham
  • PVP Points now granted for each kill

-Rune Warhammer added to Melee Weapons Store
-Dicebag added to voteshop
-Dicebag added to donatorshop
-Removed Prayer Potions from General Shop to increase the profit in Herblore
-Replace Super Strength Potion with Strength Potion in General Shop to increase the profit in Herblore
-Replace Super Attack Potion with Attack Potion in General Shop to increase the profit in Herblore
-Replace Super Defence Potion with Defence Potion in General Shop to increase the profit in Herblore
-Removed Manta Rays from the General Shop to increase the profit in Fishing/Cooking
-Removed Sharks from the General Shop to increase the profit in Fishing/Cooking

  • Slayer XP Raised
  • Melee, Magic, Range XP Rates slightly Lowered
  • Changed overall xp bonus from 3 > 2
  • A start on the war system and slavery system - Arham
  • A Start on force walking - Arham
  • Mystery Boxes being more consistant - Arham

Account backup system setup
Saves account backup every hour, saving only the last 5.
Proper sanctions via Admin Panel
Rewrite on automatic save, pull, restart with ant
Ironman started.

Miscellaneous other fixes, enhancements or backend changes.

Look forward to these future updates, coming next!

  • Combat Rewrite
  • Godwars Rewrite
  • Multi Revision and Data
  • More bug and stability fixes and improvements
  • Nex
  • Get Paid2Play systems
  • Multiple unique content updates by Arham
    [/spoiler][color=orange]
    Journey to the world of Saradomin, a 317 RSPS that’s packed with high quality content, focused around the rise of Saradomin. Our server combines the excitement of intense PVP combat, with flawless skilling and PvE that helps foster our player-driven economy.

At Saradomin, we strive to deliver unique, distinct, & diverse content that’s exclusive to our server. We’re constantly trying to improve and expand, and will never stop working to provide our members with content of the highest quality.

If you have been looking for these things, you’ve found the tip of the spear in RSPS excellence!

We offer competitive xp rates, daily bug fixes, weekly content updates, weekend events and more!

We are building our lore, quests and cutscenes as we speak getting ready for the first quest of a 40 quest storyline! - All prewritten by our wonderful lore writer!

We are not a pay to win server, in fact, there is nothing you can buy that will directly give you an immediate edge over any other player! Keeping the game as fun and competitive as it should be!
[/center]

Read full topic
item.source: Saradomin ~ Join the Best & Forget the Rest!
